MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KA8 postcode area of Ayr. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 4:19pm. Our engineers have arrived in the local area and the team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 7:15pm. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4:45pm on Monday, 19 October 2020
